attributes.action: Increase the pitiful NHS pay offer
attributes.additional_details: Staff have sacrificed so much of their lives to protect others they need to find the funds ..... Even by extra taxation to reward the selfless work they have given

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004
